unnormalised: Just a reminder that in civil law, unlike criminal law, the burden of proof lies on the plaintiff. So, if Mr. Sharma claims damages of Rs. 5,00,000 due to a property dispute, he has to provide evidence to support his claim. Cases like these under the Specific Relief Act, 1963, often take years. Also, note that limitation periods apply, generally 3 yrs from the date the cause of action arises. Consult Adv. Patil for further clarification.
